meta.description: Complete Kendo UI Fluent theme color system with light/dark themes plus VDC custom colors

surfaces.description: Guidelines for choosing surface colors by component type

rules.notes: Base layer of the application. All other surfaces float above this.
Elevated floating containers. Use with shadow for depth. Content sits on this.
Contained content areas. Use shadow-sm for subtle elevation.
Floating interactive elements. Always elevated above trigger element.
Use surface for prominent nav, app-surface for subtle/integrated nav.
Interactive form controls. Provides clear affordance for interaction.
Default table row background.
Zebra striping for better readability.
Apply on interactive elements when hovered.
Highlight selected items in lists, tables, trees.
Indicates non-interactive state. Pair with subtle text.
Chrome areas containing actions. May use border-bottom for separation.
Temporary messages. Use semantic border-left color for type indication.
High contrast for visibility. Inverts in each theme.
Main headings, body text, important content
Descriptions, captions, metadata, timestamps
Non-interactive labels, placeholder text
Clickable text links. Use primary-hover on hover.
Validation errors, destructive action warnings
Confirmation text, positive feedback
Always white for contrast on primary backgrounds
Use corresponding on-* token for proper contrast
Standard borders for inputs, cards, dividers
Light separators between sections
Keyboard focus indication (2px outline)
Invalid input indication
Resting state
Mouse over state
Mouse down or touch state
Add focus ring using primary color
Reduced opacity appearance
Highlighted/selected items

palettes.description: Base gray scale for surfaces, text, and neutral elements
palettes.usage: Base, Secondary, Light, Dark, and Inverse variable groups

palettes.usage: Warning variable group - warnings, caution states, attention needed

palettes.name: Steel Blue
palettes.usage: Info variable group - informational messages, neutral highlights

palettes.usage: Series A variable group - first series in charts and graphs

palettes.usage: Series B variable group - second series in charts and graphs

palettes.name: Electric Fuchsia
palettes.usage: Series C variable group - third series in charts and graphs

palettes.usage: Series D variable group - fourth series in charts and graphs

palettes.usage: Series E variable group - fifth series in charts and graphs

palettes.name: Terracotta Heat

colors.usage: Page background - base layer of the application
Primary text color on page background
Elevated surfaces: modals, cards, dropdowns, popovers
Alternative elevated surface for visual separation
Default borders for inputs, cards, dividers

base.description: Neutral component colors for default/secondary UI elements

colors.usage: Subtle backgrounds: disabled areas, zebra stripes, muted sections
Default interactive surface: inputs, buttons, list items

primary.description: Primary brand colors for main actions and key interactive elements

colors.usage: Selected row highlight, active nav item background
Primary buttons, main CTA, active indicators
Links, primary text on surface backgrounds

secondary.description: Secondary action colors for less prominent interactions

tertiary.description: Accent colors for special features, highlights, and differentiation

info.description: Informational colors for neutral messages and highlights

success.description: Success colors for positive states, confirmations, and completed actions

warning.description: Warning colors for caution states and attention-needed situations

error.description: Error colors for validation errors, destructive actions, and critical alerts

colors.usage: Error banner/alert background, invalid input highlight
Error icons, invalid borders, destructive button

light.description: Light variant colors for light-themed elements within dark contexts

dark.description: Dark variant colors for dark elements within light contexts

inverse.description: Inverse colors for tooltips and high-contrast elements that flip with theme

colors.usage: Tooltip text, text on inverse backgrounds

series.description: Data visualization colors for charts, graphs, and multi-series data

misc.description: Application-level surface and border colors (dark theme)

colors.usage: Primary text color on page background (dark)

inverse.description: Inverse colors (dark theme - flipped from light)

series.description: Data visualization colors (dark theme - adjusted for dark backgrounds)

vdcColors.description: VDC-specific custom colors for entities and navigation

entity.description: Colors for VDC business entities - use for icons, badges, and accent highlights

colors.usage: Default icon color when no entity-specific color applies
Ingredient entity: icons, badges, row accents, breadcrumb highlights
Ingredient entity: subtle backgrounds, selected row highlight
Release entity: icons, badges, row accents, breadcrumb highlights
Release entity: subtle backgrounds, selected row highlight
Workflow entity: icons, badges (from VDC logo golden color)

navigation.description: Colors for VDC navigation context tiers - sidebar and breadcrumb theming

colors.usage: Personal workspace context: sidebar accent, user-specific areas
Global context: matches Kendo primary, system-wide views
Project context: project-scoped views and navigation
